page.title: 15LOCAL NEWSPAPER
page.content: THE EAST ESSEX GAZETTE IS PART OF ESSEX COUNTY NEWSPAPERS, A CONSORTIUM WHICH PUBLISHES BOTH WEEKLY AND DAILY LOCAL PAPERS. THE CLACTON OFFICE IS LINKED BY COMPUTER WITH COLCHESTER AND NEWS CAN BE TRANSFERRED QUICKLY. THE EDITOR TOLD US THAT IT COSTS ABOUT 70P TO PRINT EACH PAPER BUT IT ONLY COSTS 17P FOR US TO BUY.THE COST IS REDUCED BECAUSE OF THE AMOUNT OF ADVERTISING SOLD. A FULL PAGE ADVERT COSTS Â£600-Â£700 . THE NUMBER OF PAGES OF NEWS DEPENDS ALSO ON THE AMOUNT OF ADVERTISING SOLD. THE GAZETTE SUCCESSFULLY CAMPAIGNED FOR THE RETENTION OF THE CLACTON MATERNITY UNIT WHEN IT WAS THREATENED WITH CLOSURE, A MOVE WHICH WOULD HAVE MEANT EXPECTANT MOTHERS IN FRINTON TRAVELLING TO COLCHESTER. VANDALISM, DOG-FOULING AND LOCAL PLANNING ISSUES FEATURE REGULARLY ON THE LETTERS PAGE.
